The expert: s analysis of the tax plan and its impact on the middle class.
The findings of the Tax Policy Center: which estimated that a majority of taxpayers in the $50,000 to $150,000 income range would receive a tax cut.
The conclusion of the Tax Foundation: which stated that the tax plan would result in an average tax cut of 1.7 percent for the middle quintile of taxpayers.
The response from Ting: s spokeswoman, Jessica Duong, who did not dispute the estimate that most middle-class individuals would see a tax cut under the GOP bill.
